plurals.name: sdcard_missing_error_message
plurals.item:
"The attachments can not be saved as the SD card is missing.
Please re-insert SD card."

"The attachment can not be saved as the SD card is missing.
Please re-insert SD card."

plurals.name: not_enough_memory_error_message
plurals.item: There is not enough memory to save the attachments.
There is not enough memory to save the attachment.

plurals.name: generic_error_message
plurals.item: One or more of the attachments have failed to save.
